about.summary: A python engine for evaluating Altair transforms.

name: altair_saver
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "altair_saver" %}
{% set version = "0.1.0" %}

package:
  name: "{{ name|lower }}"
  version: "{{ version }}"

source:
  url: "https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz"
  sha256: 0c6eea22b7651123594a3fed97074941ceb571ab7738633a62f28191d17b96da

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"

requirements:
  host:
    - python >=3.6
    - pip
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python >=3.6
    - altair
    - altair_data_server >=0.4.0
    - altair_viewer
    - selenium

test:
  imports:
    - altair_saver
    - altair_saver.savers

about:
  home: "http://github.com/altair-viz/altair_saver/"
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: "A python engine for evaluating Altair transforms."

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - xhochy
